org.gradle.api.tasks

Annotation Type InputFiles


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={METHOD,FIELD})
public @interface InputFiles

    Marks a property as specifying the input files for a task.

    This annotation should be attached to the getter method or the field for the property.

    This will cause the task to be considered out-of-date when the file paths or contents have changed. Also see InputDirectory.
